solution:
What this fixes: Accessibility permissions not detected after updating.
  1. Open System Settings.
  2. Go to Privacy & Security â†’ Accessibility.
  3. Find Revolution Macro.
  4. Scroll down and press the minus (-) button to remove it.
  5. Press the plus (+) button, add Revolution Macro from your Applications folder.
  6. Restart the macro and test.
